summary: Diff implements a pre-login Demo mode with state in AppContext, a “Try Demo” CTA in the Hero for unauthenticated users, generator enablement in demo mode (Generate/Surprise Me), local/offline generation via existing generateBirthdayPack, and gating of an auth-only download action with an English sign-in prompt. One onboarding AC appears incomplete: starting demo generates outputs but does not clearly scroll the user to the Output section.

missing_requirements.requirement: Starting Demo mode should scroll the user to the appropriate section (generator and/or outputs) after starting Demo mode.
missing_requirements.reason: App.startDemo() generates outputs immediately but only scrolls to the generator section; there is no evidence it scrolls to the outputs section (where the generated Birthday Pack is displayed).
